cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 70 miles SSE of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: forecast to move north-northwest through the Lower Florida Keys today, then up the west coast of Florida and inland across southwest Georgia and eastern Alabama before weakening in the Tennessee Valley

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Warning runs west of Indian Pass to the Okaloosa/Walton County line in the FL Panhandle (well east of Pascagoula)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning covers the Florida Keys and the entire Florida peninsula to Indian Pass; none issued westward toward Mississippi
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Keys and peninsula, west coast of Florida, southeast Georgia, southern South Carolina, eastern Alabama
weather_observation.wind: Outer-band gusts may reach 20–30 mph Monday-Tuesday, below tropical-storm force
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected as core remains well east; onshore flow is weak along the Mississippi coast
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain possible from outer rainbands Monday-Tuesday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Low tornado risk in any feeder bands passing across coastal Mississippi
